TopicTitle: Looking for a texturer and Unity rigger.

Articles.Content:
I need a person who can either rig unity stuff, or texture models (or both)

Currently my mod uses some stock tanks and other components I'd like to replace, but Unity is hard for me to understand, and textures don't come easy for me (unless its something like a planet).

I'll also need to know if you can UV map stuff because that just down right confuses me.

Alright, first part I'd like skinned is below and I will use it to judge who I might recruit.

http://www./?1scdc034jh0g7je

The file might not exctract without 7-Zip, it seems to be a fairly common error with the windows unzip/winRAR

If you can rig anything at all in unity you are in.

EDIT:

URL updated

Downloaded it, can UV and texture it, but my main question is WHY? it is silly ridiculously, complicated for a 2m Fueltank. I do not see the value that that top / bottom structure adds for routine gameplay?,

Just a visual, much like the KW rocketry lf tanks outer casing and inner tank visuals. (I hope you get what I meant).

Bump.

I decided to change the mesh, I agree with Lill, it was VERY complex.

I hope the new one is a little better.

Bump.

Not being harsh, but the new mesh is too simple. I'll knock out some decent FLT's for you if you have an artistic direction.....
